associateapi.name: AssociateApi
associateapi.description: Grants permission to attach a GraphQL API to a custom domain name in AppSync

associatemergedgraphqlapi.name: AssociateMergedGraphqlApi
associatemergedgraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to associate a merged API to a source API

associatesourcegraphqlapi.name: AssociateSourceGraphqlApi
associatesourcegraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to associate a source API to a merged API

createapicache.name: CreateApiCache
createapicache.description: Grants permission to create an API cache in AppSync

createapikey.name: CreateApiKey
createapikey.description: Grants permission to create a unique key that you can distribute to clients who are executing your API

createdatasource.name: CreateDataSource
createdatasource.description: Grants permission to create a data source

createdomainname.name: CreateDomainName
createdomainname.description: Grants permission to create a custom domain name in AppSync

createfunction.name: CreateFunction
createfunction.description: Grants permission to create a new function

creategraphqlapi.name: CreateGraphqlApi
creategraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to create a GraphQL API, which is the top level AppSync resource

createresolver.name: CreateResolver
createresolver.description: Grants permission to create a resolver. A resolver converts incoming requests into a format that a data source can understand, and converts the data source's responses into GraphQL

createtype.name: CreateType
createtype.description: Grants permission to create a type

deleteapicache.name: DeleteApiCache
deleteapicache.description: Grants permission to delete an API cache in AppSync

deleteapikey.name: DeleteApiKey
deleteapikey.description: Grants permission to delete an API key

deletedatasource.name: DeleteDataSource
deletedatasource.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

deletedomainname.name: DeleteDomainName
deletedomainname.description: Grants permission to delete a custom domain name in AppSync

deletefunction.name: DeleteFunction
deletefunction.description: Grants permission to delete a function

deletegraphqlapi.name: DeleteGraphqlApi
deletegraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to delete a GraphQL Api. This will also clean up every AppSync resource below that API

deleteresolver.name: DeleteResolver
deleteresolver.description: Grants permission to delete a resolver

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to remove a resource policy

deletetype.name: DeleteType
deletetype.description: Grants permission to delete a type

disassociateapi.name: DisassociateApi
disassociateapi.description: Grants permission to detach a GraphQL API to a custom domain name in AppSync

disassociatemergedgraphqlapi.name: DisassociateMergedGraphqlApi
disassociatemergedgraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to remove an associated source API from a merged API identified by the source API

disassociatesourcegraphqlapi.name: DisassociateSourceGraphqlApi
disassociatesourcegraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to remove an associated source API from a merged API identified by the merged API

evaluatecode.name: EvaluateCode
evaluatecode.description: Grants permission to evaluate code with a runtime and context

evaluatemappingtemplate.name: EvaluateMappingTemplate
evaluatemappingtemplate.description: Grants permission to evaluate template mapping

flushapicache.name: FlushApiCache
flushapicache.description: Grants permission to flush an API cache in AppSync

getapiassociation.name: GetApiAssociation
getapiassociation.description: Grants permission to read custom domain name - GraphQL API association details in AppSync

getapicache.name: GetApiCache
getapicache.description: Grants permission to read information about an API cache in AppSync

getdatasource.name: GetDataSource
getdatasource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data source

getdatasourceintrospection.name: GetDataSourceIntrospection
getdatasourceintrospection.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data source introspection

getdomainname.name: GetDomainName
getdomainname.description: Grants permission to read information about a custom domain name in AppSync

getfunction.name: GetFunction
getfunction.description: Grants permission to retrieve a function

getgraphqlapi.name: GetGraphqlApi
getgraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to retrieve a GraphQL API

getgraphqlapienvironmentvariables.name: GetGraphqlApiEnvironmentVariables
getgraphqlapienvironmentvariables.description: Grants permission to retrieve the environment variables for a GraphQL API

getintrospectionschema.name: GetIntrospectionSchema
getintrospectionschema.description: Grants permission to retrieve the introspection schema for a GraphQL API

getresolver.name: GetResolver
getresolver.description: Grants permission to retrieve a resolver

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to read a resource policy

getschemacreationstatus.name: GetSchemaCreationStatus
getschemacreationstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current status of a schema creation operation

getsourceapiassociation.name: GetSourceApiAssociation
getsourceapiassociation.description: Grants permission to read information about a merged API associated source API

gettype.name: GetType
gettype.description: Grants permission to retrieve a type

graphql.name: GraphQL
graphql.description: Grants permission to send a GraphQL query to a GraphQL API

listapikeys.name: ListApiKeys
listapikeys.description: Grants permission to list the API keys for a given API

listdatasources.name: ListDataSources
listdatasources.description: Grants permission to list the data sources for a given API

listdomainnames.name: ListDomainNames
listdomainnames.description: Grants permission to enumerate custom domain names in AppSync

listfunctions.name: ListFunctions
listfunctions.description: Grants permission to list the functions for a given API

listgraphqlapis.name: ListGraphqlApis
listgraphqlapis.description: Grants permission to list GraphQL APIs

listresolvers.name: ListResolvers
listresolvers.description: Grants permission to list the resolvers for a given API and type

listresolversbyfunction.name: ListResolversByFunction
listresolversbyfunction.description: Grants permission to list the resolvers that are associated with a specific function

listsourceapiassociations.name: ListSourceApiAssociations
listsourceapiassociations.description: Grants permission to list source APIs associated to a given merged API

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

listtypes.name: ListTypes
listtypes.description: Grants permission to list the types for a given API

listtypesbyassociation.name: ListTypesByAssociation
listtypesbyassociation.description: Grants permission to list the types for a given merged API and source API association

putgraphqlapienvironmentvariables.name: PutGraphqlApiEnvironmentVariables
putgraphqlapienvironmentvariables.description: Grants permission to update the environment variables for a GraphQL API

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to set a resource policy

setwebacl.name: SetWebACL
setwebacl.description: Grants permission to set a web ACL

sourcegraphql.name: SourceGraphQL
sourcegraphql.description: Grants permission to send a GraphQL query to a source API of a merged API

startdatasourceintrospection.name: StartDataSourceIntrospection
startdatasourceintrospection.description: Grants permission to introspect a data source

startschemacreation.name: StartSchemaCreation
startschemacreation.description: Grants permission to add a new schema to your GraphQL API. This operation is asynchronous - GetSchemaCreationStatus can show when it has completed

startschemamerge.name: StartSchemaMerge
startschemamerge.description: Grants permission to initiate a schema merge for a given merged API and associated source API

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

updateapicache.name: UpdateApiCache
updateapicache.description: Grants permission to update an API cache in AppSync

updateapikey.name: UpdateApiKey
updateapikey.description: Grants permission to update an API key for a given API

updatedatasource.name: UpdateDataSource
updatedatasource.description: Grants permission to update a data source

updatedomainname.name: UpdateDomainName
updatedomainname.description: Grants permission to update a custom domain name in AppSync

updatefunction.name: UpdateFunction
updatefunction.description: Grants permission to update an existing function

updategraphqlapi.name: UpdateGraphqlApi
updategraphqlapi.description: Grants permission to update a GraphQL API

updateresolver.name: UpdateResolver
updateresolver.description: Grants permission to update a resolver

updatesourceapiassociation.name: UpdateSourceApiAssociation
updatesourceapiassociation.description: Grants permission to update a merged API source API association

updatetype.name: UpdateType
updatetype.description: Grants permission to update a type
